Depth: Depth of Brush into surface along view ray or surface normal, depending on the Active Brush Type
bHitBackFaces: Allow the Brush to hit the back-side of the mesh
FlowRate: Brush stamps are applied at this time interval. 0 for a single stamp, 1 for continuous stamps, 0.5 is a stamp every half-second
Spacing: Space out stamp centers at distances Spacing*BrushDiameter along the stroke (so Spacing of 1 means that stamps will be adjacent but non-overlapping). Zero spacing means continuous stamps.
Lazyness: Lazy brush smooths out the brush path by averaging the cursor positions
